title: Fed Rate Cut: What the Central Bank Is Saying and What to Expect From Here
text:
On Wednesday the U.S. Federal Reserve completed its October FOMC meetingAs expected, they cut their target range for fed funds to 1.50-1.75%. However, they left it ambiguous as to what (or when) their next move might beHere are my thoughts on what was said and what to expect going forwardFed Wants to Regain Control Over Guidance In a perfect world...

It Makes A Lot Of Sense For The Fed To Wean The Market Off Its Reliance On Explicit Forward Guidance
